nodes.text: The Borvo Bunker was a bunker on the Mid Rim world of Naboo used by the Nal Raka Criminal Empire during the time of the Galactic Civil War. It was located a relatively short distance east of the city of Theed.

Circa 1 ABY, Sergeant Bragg and the RSF Intelligence Division investigated the bunker while searching for the responsibles of a terrorist attack in Theed. In the meantime, the bunker was attacked by Skaak Tipper and Darkwalker spacers.
A Borvo thug by the name of Derm Worrit occupied the bunker's lower level.
The Borvo Bunker was a location in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011.
